long_description: The powerful Light & Motion Urban 400 bike light pumps out a bright 400 lumens of light and its compact, integrated design helps keep things tidy and lightweight. With a 400 lumen output and visibility-enhancing amber side lights, the Urban 400 is well-suited for riding in densely populated areas. Run times range from 1.5 hrs. on high to 6 hrs. on low; get up to 18 hrs. of use in flash mode. Integrated lithium ion battery charges via USB in 5 hrs.; charge indicator displays the charge status so you know when to recharge. The Light & Motion Urban 400 bike light is designed to be mounted on your handlebar (fits most handlebars); mounting bracket included.
short_description: The powerful Light & Motion Urban 400 bike light pumps out a bright 400 lumens of light and its compact, integrated design helps keep things tidy and lightweight.
